prompt: List all registered users and their contact details.
Retrieve the usernames and emails of users who joined this month.
query: SELECT "username", "email" FROM "users" WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM "joinDate") = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SYSDATE) AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM "joinDate") = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE);

Retrieve details of users who haven’t placed any orders.
query: SELECT "username", "email" FROM "users" WHERE "userId" NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT "userId" FROM "orders");

query: SELECT "username", "email" FROM "users" WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM "joinDate") = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SYSDATE) AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM "joinDate") = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE);

prompt: List all products and their prices.
Show product names and their prices.
Retrieve details of products in the 'Electronics' category.
Which products are in the 'Electronics' category?
Show all products with stock quantities below 10.
List products with stock less than 10.
Which products cost more than $1000?
Retrieve all products priced above $1000.
List the names and descriptions of all available products.
Show all product names and their descriptions.
Retrieve the price and stock quantity of the product 'Smartphone.'
What is the price and stock of 'Smartphone'?
Show the total number of products in each category.
query: SELECT "categoryName", COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM "categories" c JOIN "products" p ON c."categoryId" = p."categoryId" GROUP BY "categoryName";

prompt: How many products are in each category?
query: SELECT "categoryName", COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM "categories" c JOIN "products" p ON c."categoryId" = p."categoryId" GROUP BY "categoryName";

prompt: Which products belong to the parent category 'Home Appliances'?
query: SELECT "name" FROM "products" WHERE "categoryId" IN (SELECT "categoryId" FROM "categories" WHERE "parentCategoryId" = (SELECT "categoryId" FROM "categories" WHERE "categoryName" = 'Home Appliances'));

prompt: List products under the parent category 'Home Appliances'.
query: SELECT "name" FROM "products" WHERE "categoryId" IN (SELECT "categoryId" FROM "categories" WHERE "parentCategoryId" = (SELECT "categoryId" FROM "categories" WHERE "categoryName" = 'Home Appliances'));

query: SELECT "categoryName", COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM "categories" c JOIN "products" p ON c."categoryId" = p."categoryId" GROUP BY "categoryName";

prompt: List the total product count per category.
query: SELECT "categoryName", COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM "categories" c JOIN "products" p ON c."categoryId" = p."categoryId" GROUP BY "categoryName";

prompt: Find all products in the 'Home Appliances' parent category.
query: SELECT "name" FROM "products" WHERE "categoryId" IN (SELECT "categoryId" FROM "categories" WHERE "parentCategoryId" = (SELECT "categoryId" FROM "categories" WHERE "categoryName" = 'Home Appliances'));

prompt: What products fall under 'Home Appliances' parent category?
query: SELECT "name" FROM "products" WHERE "categoryId" IN (SELECT "categoryId" FROM "categories" WHERE "parentCategoryId" = (SELECT "categoryId" FROM "categories" WHERE "categoryName" = 'Home Appliances'));

prompt: List all product categories and their parents.
query: SELECT "categoryName", (SELECT "categoryName" FROM "categories" WHERE "categoryId" = "parentCategoryId") AS parent_category FROM "categories";

prompt: Show product categories and their parent categories.
query: SELECT "categoryName", (SELECT "categoryName" FROM "categories" WHERE "categoryId" = "parentCategoryId") AS parent_category FROM "categories";

prompt: Subcategories under 'Fashion'?
Retrieve subcategories for 'Fashion'.
Categories without parent categories?
Show all root categories.
Which categories have subcategories?
query: SELECT DISTINCT c1."categoryName" FROM "categories" c1 JOIN "categories" c2 ON c1."categoryId" = c2."parentCategoryId";

prompt: List categories with subcategories.
query: SELECT DISTINCT c1."categoryName" FROM "categories" c1 JOIN "categories" c2 ON c1."categoryId" = c2."parentCategoryId";

prompt: How many categories exist in the database?
Retrieve total number of categories.
Category hierarchy starting with 'Electronics'?
query: WITH RECURSIVE category_hierarchy AS (SELECT "categoryId", "categoryName", "parentCategoryId" FROM "categories" WHERE "categoryName" = 'Electronics' UNION ALL SELECT c."categoryId", c."categoryName", c."parentCategoryId" FROM "categories" c INNER JOIN category_hierarchy ch ON c."parentCategoryId" = ch."categoryId") SELECT "categoryName" FROM category_hierarchy;

prompt: Show hierarchy for 'Electronics' category.
query: WITH RECURSIVE category_hierarchy AS (SELECT "categoryId", "categoryName", "parentCategoryId" FROM "categories" WHERE "categoryName" = 'Electronics' UNION ALL SELECT c."categoryId", c."categoryName", c."parentCategoryId" FROM "categories" c INNER JOIN category_hierarchy ch ON c."parentCategoryId" = ch."categoryId") SELECT "categoryName" FROM category_hierarchy;

prompt: Subcategories of 'Furniture' parent category?
Which categories belong to 'Furniture'?
Categories with more than 10 products?
query: SELECT "categoryName" FROM "categories" WHERE "categoryId" IN (SELECT "categoryId" FROM "products" GROUP BY "categoryId" HAVING COUNT(*) > 10);

prompt: List categories having more than 10 items.
query: SELECT "categoryName" FROM "categories" WHERE "categoryId" IN (SELECT "categoryId" FROM "products" GROUP BY "categoryId" HAVING COUNT(*) > 10);

prompt: List all orders placed in the past 30 days.
Show orders made in the last month.
Details of orders by 'JaneDoe'?
Retrieve orders for 'JaneDoe'.
Show all completed orders.
Which orders are marked as 'Completed'?
Orders with total price over $500?
List orders costing more than $500.
Details of order with ID 101?
Retrieve info for order 101.
How many orders were placed today?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM "orders" WHERE TRUNC("orderDate") = TRUNC(SYSDATE);

prompt: Number of orders placed today?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM "orders" WHERE TRUNC("orderDate") = TRUNC(SYSDATE);

prompt: List pending orders.
Show all 'Pending' orders.
Total revenue from all orders?
What is the total revenue generated?
List all items in the order with ID 202.
Show items for order ID 202.
Retrieve quantity and price of products in order 303.
Details of products in order 303?
Which products were bought more than 50 times?
query: SELECT "productId", SUM("quantity") AS total_quantity FROM "orderItems" GROUP BY "productId" HAVING SUM("quantity") > 50;

prompt: Products sold over 50 times?
query: SELECT "productId", SUM("quantity") AS total_quantity FROM "orderItems" GROUP BY "productId" HAVING SUM("quantity") > 50;

prompt: Total items sold for each product?
query: SELECT "productId", SUM("quantity") AS total_quantity FROM "orderItems" GROUP BY "productId";

prompt: Show total sales for each product.
query: SELECT "productId", SUM("quantity") AS total_quantity FROM "orderItems" GROUP BY "productId";

prompt: Order items priced over $200?
Retrieve items where price exceeds $200.
Items associated with product 'Laptop'?
List order items for 'Laptop'.
Orders containing more than 5 items?
query: SELECT "orderId", SUM("quantity") AS total_items FROM "orderItems" GROUP BY "orderId" HAVING SUM("quantity") > 5;

prompt: Show orders with more than 5 items.
query: SELECT "orderId", SUM("quantity") AS total_items FROM "orderItems" GROUP BY "orderId" HAVING SUM("quantity") > 5;

prompt: Revenue from 'Headphones'?
query: SELECT SUM("quantity" * "price") AS total_revenue FROM "orderItems" WHERE "productId" = (SELECT "productId" FROM "products" WHERE "name" = 'Headphones');

prompt: Total revenue generated by 'Headphones'?
query: SELECT SUM("quantity" * "price") AS total_revenue FROM "orderItems" WHERE "productId" = (SELECT "productId" FROM "products" WHERE "name" = 'Headphones');

prompt: List all reviews for the product 'Smartphone'.
Show ratings and reviews by user 'JohnDoe'.
Which reviews have a 5-star rating?
Products with more than 10 reviews?
query: SELECT "productId", COUNT(*) AS review_count FROM "reviews" GROUP BY "productId" HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;

prompt: Average rating of the product 'Gaming Laptop'?
query: SELECT AVG("rating") AS average_rating FROM "reviews" WHERE "productId" = (SELECT "productId" FROM "products" WHERE "name" = 'Gaming Laptop');

prompt: Show reviews submitted last week.
Total reviews for each product?
query: SELECT "productId", COUNT(*) AS total_reviews FROM "reviews" GROUP BY "productId";

prompt: Users who reviewed more than 5 products?
query: SELECT "userId", COUNT(DISTINCT "productId") AS products_reviewed FROM "reviews" GROUP BY "userId" HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT "productId") > 5;

prompt: Retrieve reviews for 'Smartphone' and their ratings.
List all 5-star reviews.
List all active coupons and their discount percentages.
Retrieve details of expired coupons.
Show all coupons with a discount of more than 20%.
Which coupons are set to expire in the next 7 days?
query: SELECT * FROM "coupons" WHERE "expirationDate" BETWEEN SYSDATE AND SYSDATE + 7;

prompt: List all coupons with usage limits greater than 100.
Retrieve the code and expiration date of the coupon with ID 505.
How many coupons are currently valid?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) AS valid_coupons FROM "coupons" WHERE "expirationDate" >= SYSDATE;

prompt: Show the total number of times each coupon has been used.
query: SELECT c."code", COUNT(o."couponId") AS total_usage FROM "coupons" c JOIN "orders" o ON c."couponId" = o."couponId" GROUP BY c."code";
